data.title: A tribute to the science fiction author Robert Sheckley
data.meta_description: A tribute to science fiction author Robert Sheckley: novels, anthologies, short stories, reviews, interviews and more. Harry Harrison, Roger Zelazny, Douglas Adams, black humour
data.text:
Links

Where/When/Which?

This site includes lists Sheckley's novels and short stories. I have also reviewed most of the novels and short story anthologies. These reviews are intended to help people find his best work. Despite the welcome release of "Dimensions of Sheckley" and "Masque of Manana", much of his work remains out of print. Second hand copies are fairly easy to find, and a good place to look is the Advanced Book Exchange.

You can e-mail any comments or information to me by clicking here: Marcos

Wanted:

This page is always under construction. I'm sure there are a few things that have escaped my attention. Tell me what I've missed out! What did Sheckley write for Atlantic Monthly? Which Captain Video scripts did he write?

This page was last updated: Jan 2007

Did I mention he was funny?
